description.para: In a cluster, ctdb is very unhappy if tdb database locks are held for extended periods of time. This parameter adds a warning threshold in milliseconds. If Samba holds a lock for longer that ctdb locktime warn threshold milliseconds, a debug level 0 message is printed when the lock is released. This is mainly a debugging aid for post-mortem analysis.
If this parameter is set to 0, no message is printed.
